quotes.message: You send your child to the schoolmaster, but it's the schoolboys who educate him.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: There are three good reasons to be a teacher - June, July, and August.
quotes.name: Unknown

quotes.message: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: I have never let my schooling interfere with my education.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: He who opens a school door, closes a prison one.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo
